extendedInfo.description: Wouldn't it be wonderful your girlfriend's voice wakes you up?Or your mom reminds you to have lunch? Or your professor reminds you to do the homework?With this app, you can create and save audio records and have them remind you at the time you specify. So just record you girlfriend waking you up, or record your professor scolding you do your homework, and set the records remind you at particular time. That's it. In a nutshell, this is AUDIO REMINDER. For any issues, contact us as manas.gajare@dexterltd.comP.S. Do not put stupid comments for issues, instead mail us so that we can respond.

reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!!
reviews.comment: GREAT APP, DOES WHAT IT SAYS AND IS EASY TO USE!  It will keep playing the reminder that you recorded in your own voice just like an alarm clock until you hit stop! \"works for me\" - should be at least a 4.5 rating for this app...   Just wish they had a cooler icon!  LOL
reviews.author: JOHN HICKSON

reviews.title: Its average
reviews.comment: Buddy. Your app is great but it really lacks two very important features! Record from text-to-voice AND recurring alerts. Please push an update when done Im ready to buy. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t even work. It\'s closes by itself and you can\'t save anything.
reviews.author: A Google User
